sentences.en: A fee is charged for each year of study and is payable at enrolment.
sentences.cn: 学费每年收取，可在登记注册时缴纳。

sentences.en: Across the country, college enrolment rates are at an all - time high.
sentences.cn: 全国的大学新生注册率已经达到了迄今最高水平.

sentences.en: By 1922 the public schools had an enrolment of nearly 16,000 students.
sentences.cn: 到1922年，公学的注册学生数接近16,000。

sentences.en: Educational development is measured as a combination of attainment - adult literacy - and opportunity - enrolment.
sentences.cn: 衡量教育的发展则要结合成就(成人识字率)与机会(入学率).
小学入学注册明天开始.

sentences.en: Enrolment will take place in September.
For personal enrolment, payment must be made by cheque.
sentences.cn: 如非贸易通客户, 请以支票为付款方式.

sentences.en: I understand and agree the Enrolment Guidelines listed at the back.
sentences.cn: 本人清楚并同意后页[申请须知]所载的内容.

sentences.en: Parents are required to complete this section as a condition of enrolment.
sentences.cn: 父母同意学员以学完整个学期作为入学条件.

sentences.en: Participants are advised to keep the completed enrolment form for record.
sentences.cn: 建议参与者保留已填妥及递交之报名表格作存根之用.

sentences.en: Please send to Tsim Sha Tsui or Central Enrolment Centre.
sentences.cn: 请寄予本院尖沙咀或中环报名中心.

sentences.en: The due amount will be debited from the enrolment has been received.
sentences.cn: 报名费用的金额将在协会收到报名申请当日从阁下的账户中扣除.

sentences.en: The school has an enrolment of 800 students.
sentences.cn: 该学校有八百名学生注册.

sentences.en: This school has an enrolment of 800 pupils.
sentences.cn: 这所学校有800名学生注册.

sentences.en: With student enrolment dwindling, the Japanese - language schools are struggling to survive.
sentences.cn: 日语学校惨淡经营,学日语的学生人数每况愈下.

sentences.en: You will be given a reading list at enrolment.
sentences.cn: 注册时你会收到一份阅读书目。

words.tran_cn: 入学者；入会者；被征入伍者
参加；登记；注册；记入名册
登记；使加入；把...记入名册；使入伍

trans.tran_cn: 入学，注册（人数），登记（人数）
trans.tran_en: the process of arranging to join a school, university, course etc
